subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Becky Hammon scored 24 points and the rookie Sherill Baker had 15 as the Liberty defeated the Los Angeles Sparks in overtime to win its home opener and end a season-opening four-game losing streak.
snippet: Becky Hammon scored 24 points and the rookie Sherill Baker had 15 as the Liberty defeated the Los Angeles Sparks in overtime to win its home opener and end a season-opening four-game losing streak.
